description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的政治家、外交家和金融家，宋氏家族成员。曾历任国民政府财政部长、中央银行总裁、行政院长、外交部长、广东省政府主席等要职。
description.en: A politician, diplomat, and financier during the Republic of China era, and a member of the Soong family. He held key positions such as Minister of Finance of the Nationalist Government, Governor of the Central Bank, Premier of the Executive Yuan, Minister of Foreign Affairs, and Chairman of the Guangdong Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及军事家，曾任国民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、银行家，宋子文的姐夫，曾接替宋子文担任财政部长。
description.en: A politician and banker of the Republic of China, brother-in-law of T.V. Soong, who succeeded Soong as Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中国国民党创始人，宋子文的二姐夫。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, physician, and political philosopher, who served as the first provisional president of the Republic of China and the first leader of the Kuomintang. He was T.V. Soong's second brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 美南监理会牧师及富商，孙中山革命的支持者，宋子文的父亲。
description.en: A Methodist minister and wealthy businessman who supported Sun Yat-sen's revolution; father of T.V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的大姐，孔祥熙的妻子。
description.en: T.V. Soong's eldest sister and wife of H. H. Kung.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的二姐，孙中山的妻子。
description.en: T.V. Soong's second sister and wife of Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的妹妹，蒋中正的妻子。
description.en: T.V. Soong's younger sister and wife of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的弟弟。
description.en: T.V. Soong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的妻子。
description.en: Wife of T.V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of T.V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, USA.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪末至20世纪中叶在中国上海的一所教会大学。
description.en: A Christian university in Shanghai from the late 19th century to the mid-20th century.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府负责外交事务的部门。
description.en: The ministry of the Republic of China that manages foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府负责财政事务的部门。
description.en: The ministry of the Republic of China that manages fiscal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国有商业银行之一。
description.en: One of the state-owned commercial banks in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家。曾撰文猛烈抨击宋子文的财经政策，是导致其辞职的原因之一。
description.en: A Chinese historian and educator. He wrote articles fiercely criticizing T.V. Soong's financial policies, which was one of the reasons for Soong's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 1947年初，国民政府为抑制通货膨胀而采取的黄金自由买卖政策失败，引发的金融混乱和恶性通货膨胀事件。
description.en: In early 1947, the Nationalist Government's policy of free gold trading, intended to curb inflation, failed, leading to financial chaos and hyperinflation.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统。据传记称，他曾指责宋子文、孔祥熙和蒋中正家族侵吞美国援助。
description.en: The 33rd President of the United States. According to a biography, he accused the Soong, Kung, and Chiang families of embezzling US aid.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、文学家、外交家。曾批评宋子文“自私自利”，并与其在外交事务上存在摩擦。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher, writer, and diplomat. He criticized T.V. Soong as 'selfish' and had friction with him over diplomatic affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，西安事变发动者之一，与宋子文是好友。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China, one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident, and a friend of T.V. Soong.

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统。曾与宋子文会谈，并表示愿意向中国提供援助。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States. He met with T.V. Soong and expressed willingness to provide aid to China.

en: Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance

description.zh-cn: 1945年中华民国国民政府与苏联签订的条约，由宋子文代表中方签署。
description.en: A treaty signed in 1945 between the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China and the Soviet Union, signed by T.V. Soong on behalf of the Chinese side.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记和苏联部长会议主席。曾与宋子文会谈并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: A Soviet politician who served as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and Chairman of the Council of Ministers. He met with T.V. Soong and signed the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 1933年宋子文代表南京国民政府与美国达成的5000万美元贷款协议，主要以棉花和小麦支付。
description.en: A $50 million loan agreement reached in 1933 between the Nanjing Nationalist Government, represented by T.V. Soong, and the United States, mainly paid in cotton and wheat.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1948年间的国家统治机关。
description.en: The ruling body of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国广东省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Guangdong Province in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，宋子文担任孙中山的英文秘书。
description.en: In 1923, T.V. Soong served as Sun Yat-sen's English Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是孔祥熙的妻弟。
description.en: T.V. Soong was H. H. Kung's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是蒋中正的妻兄。
description.en: T.V. Soong was Chiang Kai-shek's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 1912年在圣约翰大学就读。
description.en: Studied at St. John's University in 1912.

description.zh-cn: 1915年于哈佛大学经济学系毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Harvard University with a degree in Economics in 1915.

description.zh-cn: 1915年至1917年在哥伦比亚大学研究所就读。
description.en: Studied at the graduate school of Columbia University from 1915 to 1917.

description.zh-cn: 1933年，宋子文因“棉麦大借款”部分款项被蒋介石挪用于内战而与其发生激烈冲突，蒋甚至打了宋一记耳光，宋随即辞去财长等职务。此后两人在预算和政策问题上多次发生冲突。
description.en: In 1933, T.V. Soong clashed fiercely with Chiang Kai-shek after parts of the 'Cotton and Wheat Loan' were diverted by Chiang for the civil war. Chiang even slapped Soong, who then resigned as finance minister. They clashed multiple times over budget and policy issues thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文为人自负傲慢，与处事较为圆滑的孔祥熙相处不来。
description.en: T.V. Soong, who was known for his pride and arrogance, did not get along with the more tactful H. H. Kung.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年发表《这个样子的宋子文非走开不可》等文章，猛烈抨击宋子文的财经政策和个人作风，引发巨大舆论压力，是导致宋子文辞去行政院长职务的重要原因之一。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien published articles such as 'This Kind of T.V. Soong Must Go,' fiercely criticizing Soong's financial policies and personal style. This created immense public pressure and was a major factor leading to Soong's resignation as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 1947年初，宋子文内阁为抑制通货膨胀而采取的黄金自由买卖政策彻底失败，引发金融混乱和恶性通货膨胀（黄金风潮），最终导致其引咎辞去行政院长职务。
description.en: In early 1947, the policy of free gold trading adopted by the T.V. Soong cabinet to curb inflation failed completely, triggering financial chaos and hyperinflation (the Gold Rush Crisis), ultimately leading to his resignation as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 据美国作家默尔·米勒未经授权的杜鲁门传记称，杜鲁门曾大骂宋家和孔家为“贼”，侵吞了美国对华援助。但该说法的真实性存疑。
description.en: According to an unauthorized biography of Truman by American writer Merle Miller, Truman allegedly cursed the Soong and Kung families as 'thieves' for embezzling U.S. aid to China. However, the authenticity of this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 胡适在日记中批评宋子文“自私自利”，认为他不适合担任代理行政院长。两人在外交事务上也存在摩擦。
description.en: Hu Shih criticized T.V. Soong in his diary as 'selfish,' believing he was unfit to be acting Premier. The two also had friction over diplomatic affairs.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与张学良是好友，曾在西安事变时出面调解。尽管是朋友，张学良晚年也曾评价宋子文能力不高且没人缘。
description.en: T.V. Soong and Chang Hsueh-liang were close friends, and Soong helped mediate during the Xi'an Incident. Despite their friendship, Chang in his later years also commented that Soong was not highly capable and was unpopular.

relationships.target: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 1933年5月8日，宋子文与美国总统罗斯福会谈，罗斯福表示愿意向中国提供援助。
description.en: On May 8, 1933, T.V. Soong met with U.S. President Roosevelt, who expressed willingness to provide aid to China.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，宋子文赴苏联与斯大林会谈，并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: In 1945, T.V. Soong went to the Soviet Union to meet with Stalin and sign the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 作为国民政府外交部长，宋子文代表中方签署了《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: As the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Nationalist Government, T.V. Soong signed the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance on behalf of the Chinese side.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文代表国民政府与美国达成5000万美元的“棉麦大借款”协议。
description.en: T.V. Soong, on behalf of the Nationalist Government, secured the $50 million 'Cotton and Wheat Loan' agreement with the United States.

description.zh-cn: 1935年，时任财政部长的孔祥熙宣布由宋子文接任中国银行董事长。
description.en: In 1935, Minister of Finance H. H. Kung announced that T.V. Soong would take over as Chairman of the Bank of China.
